reviewText: Good variety of entertaining shows about robots, for the most part very educational
This was a super find while just browsing on the site, my son and I both enjoy a look into what scientists are up to and what the future might look like.
hoped for something a little more detailed. it was fun to watch,more more we want more and i do not have that many words to say about this little kids dvd.
Not especially educational, but it has some good information. Makes a good filler for a day when I have a sub
Well worth the low price and good overview of progressive technologies  in the computer robot fields as well as others etc.
Very good movie. Very happy with my purchase and the company I purchased it from.
